definition: what one does/doings
actually/place/classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc/that which/particle introducing a relative clause or passive/CL:個|个[ge4]
variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)
one's conduct and deeds

sentences.english: ChengKang found driving end be chafed, cognizance is concise.
sentences.chinese: 承康发现座驾车尾被擦花，认定是简洁所为。

sentences.english: This was the Lord's doing and we marvel at it.
sentences.chinese: 那是上主的所行所为，在我们眼中神妙莫测。

sentences.english: Do you think that politician is on the up-and-up?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得那位政客的所作所为是否光明磊落？
到底这种知识所为为何？

sentences.english: The Sakhnin fans will say it was a plastic bullet.
sentences.chinese: 萨克宁哈普洱队的球迷会说这是一个橡皮子弹所为。

sentences.english: The manager disavowed any knowledge of my actions.
sentences.chinese: 经理否认知道我的所作所为。

sentences.english: Shouldn’t I be punished for what I have done?
sentences.chinese: 我难道不该为我的所作所为得到应有的惩罚么？

sentences.english: Does this mean Fido is into dominance and submission?
sentences.chinese: 这就意味着大黄所作所为是统治与服从的表现么？

sentences.english: And so we ask ourselves. Will our actions echo across the centuries ?
sentences.chinese: 于是我们问自己，我们所作所为是否会千古留名？

sentences.english: Horwath International member firms create customized solutions for every client.
sentences.chinese: 浩华国际会员所为每个客户度身订做独特的方案。

sentences.english: The moment he knows, his laugh bursts forth and makes one forgive everything.
sentences.chinese: 知晓之时，他便放声大笑，使人原谅他的一切所为。

sentences.english: This was obviously easier for riding, but not very ladylike.
sentences.chinese: 这样骑起来当然容易些，只是不像女士所为。

sentences.english: GuoXu heard no ship can rent, immediately thought of certain days for phoenix.
sentences.chinese: 郭旭听说无船可租，马上想到一定天凤所为。

sentences.english: He now has a long time to reflect on what he has done.
sentences.chinese: 现在他有很长的一段时间来反省他的所作所为。

sentences.english: The inscription on the wall of Hongjia Big Room was written by Gu Longxian's military unit of the Taiping Rebellion Army.
sentences.chinese: 洪家大屋官厅墙壁上的题字是太平军古隆贤部所为。

sentences.english: And federal investigators are looking into his methods.
sentences.chinese: 联邦调查人员也在调查他的所为。

one's conduct and deeds
path/conduct/behavior

murderer/assassin

violent crime/to commit a violent act (assault or murder)
intent/intention/to intend

to frame sb (by planting sth on them)
death cannot wipe out the crimes (idiom); dreadful crimes that rankled even after the perpetrator is dead

to conspire to murder/to plot against sb's life
